Review.Titre: Da Vinci’s Inquest Recording Quality Review
Review.Contenu: Generally, the video quality was excellent. The first three seasons had probably 1080p quality because only those seasons were distributed as DVD’s. Seasons 4-7 had a lower quality (720p) since they were copied from mainly the Chicago TV station of WGN. But that was the only way to get a copy of these seasons.The price of $71 was excellent. Buying DVD’s for only the first three seasons would have cost way more.Only one episode had bad skips, even after I tried to clean it. So, it was basically unwatchable. But given that there were 13 episodes per season and 7 seasons, one bad  episode recording out of 91 is pretty good.So, overall, I’d recommend iOffer.

At first my order did not come on time and I thought I was being scammed. I contacted support and they responded fairly quick saying to wait a few more days for it to process (it was an online digital copy of a tv show I ordered that I could download), I waited and it still didn't come. After about 5-6 days (delivery time was expected within 3 days) I finally got the download link and I now have my order. Happy days.Depending on if I have any issues with the series I downloaded, I will update this review. I will consider buying from them again if the quality of the content delivered reaches my expectations.

Review.Titre: A good resource, especially for hard-to-source series
Review.Contenu: My purchase was delivered quite timely, and it was easy to download the episodes. The only hiccup was that there were no captions encoded, since mine was a series in English. It took a few messages to customer support to figure this out, but I think I understand correctly that subtitles and captioning won't be available if the series or movie is in English, but there will be subtitles if the film isn't in English. Hopefully, this helps those who are hard of hearing like me, or American (also like me) trying to listen to a Yorkshire accent and keep up!

It would have been easier to store one plastic DVD container holding all the discs together rather than having several separate paper sleeves that could easily be lost, stepped on or broken, since I have no place to store them safely separately.  The product itself was  satisfactory and I would purchase again from iOffer Movies.

Anyway they were received fine and I think four DVDs stacked one on top of another forms a solid mass. I like the way it’s recoded, three episodes per disk and easy to use.  I will definitely order more from this vendor in future.  It would have been five stars but I’m a tad wary of the packaging, putting it in a stronger envelop or small box would give me more confidence.  No breakage though. Review.Titre: Secure site, and a very good store and seller
Review.Contenu: Secure site ( my experience ) and checkout/payment.I choose the option ”Other payment methods” When making the order, and attach the message ”please send a link to pay-PAL” Works perfectly.The seller, to my experience, is very service-minded,and we’ve had very functioning and nice correspondence. The shipping cost is very reasonable ( ask the seller If you have any wishes about it ). Good packaging. Shipping time about 30 days. The movie selection is just so great; so many wonderful titles I’ve found here. The picture/recording quality is mainly good ( not HD of course ). I’ve purchased about 20 and was not pleased with two maybe three of them ( with two of them It was not a big deal ). With many titles It’s both such a pleasure of finding/watching them On DVD, such good films, and the nice clarity and colour tone of the picture. For Some of the 1960-80:s movies the old colour tones, and with some a certain graininess ( for example with the Canadian movie Sonatine from 1984 ) is just a pure pleasure watching.Skickat från min iPad

Review.Titre: I purchased 1 thru 6 of the repair shop…
Review.Contenu: I did purchase the Repair Shop 1 thru 6 dvd set. So far, I have been able to watch the first two. As time goes by, I will find time to watch the remaining dvds ( Very busy Christmas Season).Very good quality video, no problems so far. There is a directory on each dvd😊, but no artwork😩.I would have paid extra for tracking the shipment, since there was a long shipping times.Suggestions; DVD artwork.How many total hours on each dvd set or have it included on the website.Mail tracking.Direct contact with the vendor.I have purchased the repair shop season 7, it would be nice to see improvements.It would be nice to get notification when season 8-10 becomes available.
